description: This file defines API routes for authentication in a FastAPI application, including user registration, login, and fetching current user info.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI router object used to define API endpoints.

methods.name: register_user
methods.description: Handles user registration by creating a new user record in the database.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token.

methods.name: read_users_me
methods.description: Returns the current authenticated user's public information.
